sentences.en: A ring of muscle, the cardiac sphincter, surrounds the esophagus at this point.
sentences.cn: 此处有一肌肉环即贲门括约肌围绕着食道.

sentences.en: Bile reflux can induce the lesions of stomach and esophagus.
sentences.cn: 胆汁反流可引起胃与食管粘膜病变,胆汁监测是最有效的诊断方法之一.

sentences.en: Can be esophagus cancer treated? Do I want exact solution?
sentences.cn: 食道癌可以治好吗? 我要确切的答案?

sentences.en: Congenital stenosis of the esophagus is not common.
sentences.cn: 先天性食管狭窄并不常见.

sentences.en: Do not attempt to force the dog to vomit as this can burn the esophagus and stomach and cause further complications.
sentences.cn: 不要试图强迫狗狗呕吐，因为这样会烧坏食管和胃，并更进一步引起并发症。

sentences.en: Esophageal carcinomas probably originate from glands propria of esophagus.
sentences.cn: 食管腺癌可能起源于食管固有腺.

sentences.en: Heartburn also know as acid reflux is caused by progesterone relaxing the valve separating the esophagus from the stomach allowing acids to seep up the pipe.
sentences.cn: 胃灼热，同时也被叫做胃酸倒流，这是因为黄体酮使瓣膜松弛把食道和胃分开了，这会让胃酸渗到食管里。

sentences.en: Horse 's narrow esophagus results in repeated choke.
sentences.cn: 马的食道狭窄，常常引起食道阻塞。

sentences.en: Horse's narrow esophagus stenosis results in repeated choke.
sentences.cn: 马的食道狭窄,常常引起食道阻塞.

sentences.en: Is the person very old Oh art of esophagus cancer hotshot?
sentences.cn: 人很老了得了食道癌能手术 吗 ?

sentences.en: One is a 9-month-old infant, adopted from Korea, who was born without a windpipe and breathes through a hole in her esophagus.
sentences.cn: 其中一位是一个被收养的韩国婴儿，9个月大，她天生就没有气管，只能通过开在食道上的一个孔呼吸。

sentences.en: Peristalsis in the body of the esophagus is under vagal control.
sentences.cn: 食管本体的蠕动受迷走神经支配.

sentences.en: Tan - yellow plaques are seen in the lower esophagus, along with mucosal hyperemia.
sentences.cn: 食管下段可见黄褐色的斑块, 同时黏膜充血.

sentences.en: There the incidence of the cancer of the esophagus was suspected to be pretty high.
sentences.cn: 估计那里的食道癌发病率相当高。

sentences.en: What is the dietary rudder of the patient after esophagus cancer art?
sentences.cn: 食管癌术后病人的饮食指导原则是什么?

sentences.en: What is the optimal food after esophagus cancer surgery?
sentences.cn: 食道癌手术后的最佳饮食是什么?

sentences.en: When food is swallowed, it passed through the pharynx and in the esophagus.
sentences.cn: 食物被咽下, 经过咽进入食道.

sentences.en: Which detail should food of esophagus cancer patient notice?
sentences.cn: 食管癌患者饮食应注意哪细节?

sentences.en: You will be laid on your side or back in a comfortable position as the endoscope is gently passed through your mouth and into your esophagus, stomach and duodenum.
sentences.cn: 当你找到一个舒服的正卧或侧卧姿势躺好后，医务人员会从你的口轻轻放入内视镜。 内视镜通过口、食管，到达胃和十二指肠。
